title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: Modeling and Reflection for ICT Integration in Language Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Three or more language teaching strategies can be designed when explaining mathematical concepts using digital tools.
ICT-integrated lesson models can be revised and supplemented two or more times based on peer feedback.
A technology use reflection journal can be written to analyze educational effectiveness with over 80% clarity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
